item.title: Who want's to play in the Champions Leauge?
item.description: With the 2018-2019 Premeir League wrapping up, Tottenham Hotspur are close to securing their place in the Champions League next year. Unfortunately, that’s not because we have been playing well. Four teams arguably had an oppurtunity to secure UCL football, only to see a sharp dip in form. How bad was it?
